verses.verse: Then <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>me,<s%> Though Moses and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5315>me,<s%> yet my mind would not be toward this <S%H5971>people:<s%> cast them <S%H7971>out<s%> of my <S%H6440>sight,<s%> and let them go <S%H3318>forth.<s%>

It shall <S%H559>happen,<s%> when they tell <S%H3318>you,<s%> Where shall we go forth? Then you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> Such as are for <S%H4194>death,<s%> to <S%H4194>death;<s%> and such as are for the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and such as are for the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> to the <S%H7458>famine;<s%> and such as are for <S%H7628>captivity,<s%> to <S%H7628>captivity.<s%>

I will <S%H6485>appoint<s%> over them <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4940>kinds,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> to <S%H2026>kill,<s%> and the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> to <S%H5498>tear,<s%> and the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and the <S%H929>animals<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> to <S%H398>devour<s%> and to <S%H7843>destroy.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>cause<s%> them to be <S%H2189>tossed<s%> back and forth among all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H1558>because<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3169>Hezekiah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> for that which he <S%H6213>did<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
For who will have <S%H2550>pity<s%> on <S%H3389>you,<s%> Jerusalem? or who will <S%H5110>bemoan<s%> <S%H5493>you?<s%> or who will turn aside to <S%H7592>ask<s%> of your <S%H7965>welfare?<s%>

You have <S%H5203>rejected<s%> <S%H5002>me,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you have <S%H3212>gone<s%> <S%H268>backward:<s%> therefore have I stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> against <S%H7843>you,<s%> and destroyed <S%H3811>you;<s%> I am weary with <S%H5162>repenting.<s%>

I have <S%H2219>winnowed<s%> them with a <S%H2219>fan<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%> I have <S%H7921>bereaved<s%> them of <S%H6>children,<s%> I have destroyed my <S%H5971>people;<s%> they <S%H7725>didn't<s%> return from their <S%H1870>ways.<s%>

Their <S%H490>widows<s%> are <S%H6105>increased<s%> to me above the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas;<s%> I have <S%H935>brought<s%> on them against the <S%H517>mother<s%> of the young <S%H970>men<s%> a <S%H7703>destroyer<s%> at <S%H6672>noonday:<s%> I have caused <S%H6597>anguish<s%> and <S%H928>terrors<s%> to <S%H5307>fall<s%> on her <S%H6597>suddenly.<s%>

She who has <S%H3205>borne<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H535>languishes;<s%> she has given <S%H5301>up<s%> the <S%H5315>spirit;<s%> her <S%H8121>sun<s%> is <S%H935>gone<s%> down while it was yet <S%H3119>day;<s%> she has been <S%H954>disappointed<s%> and <S%H2659>confounded:<s%> and their <S%H7611>residue<s%> will I <S%H5414>deliver<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H188>Woe<s%> is <S%H517>me,<s%> my mother, that you have <S%H3205>borne<s%> me a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H7379>strife<s%> and a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4066>contention<s%> to the whole <S%H776>earth!<s%> I have not <S%H5383>lent,<s%> neither have <S%H5383>men<s%> lent to <S%H7043>me;<s%> yet everyone of them curses me.

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Most <S%H3808>certainly<s%> I will <S%H2896>strengthen<s%> you for <S%H8281>good;<s%> most <S%H518>certainly<s%> I will cause the <S%H341>enemy<s%> to make <S%H6293>supplication<s%> to you in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%> and in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6869>affliction.<s%>
Can one <S%H7489>break<s%> <S%H1270>iron,<s%> even <S%H1270>iron<s%> from the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and <S%H5178>brass?<s%>

Your <S%H2428>substance<s%> and your <S%H214>treasures<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> for a <S%H957>spoil<s%> without <S%H4242>price,<s%> and that for all your <S%H2403>sins,<s%> even in all your <S%H1366>borders.<s%>

I will make them to <S%H5674>pass<s%> with your <S%H341>enemies<s%> into a <S%H776>land<s%> which you <S%H3045>don't<s%> know; for a <S%H784>fire<s%> is <S%H6919>kindled<s%> in my <S%H639>anger,<s%> which shall burn on <S%H3344>you.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you <S%H3045>know;<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H6485>me,<s%> and visit <S%H5358>me,<s%> and avenge me of my <S%H7291>persecutors;<s%> <S%H3947>don't<s%> take me away in your <S%H639>longsuffering:<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> that for your sake I have <S%H5375>suffered<s%> <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>

Your <S%H1697>words<s%> were <S%H4672>found,<s%> and I <S%H398>ate<s%> <S%H1697>them;<s%> and your words were to me a <S%H8342>joy<s%> and the <S%H8057>rejoicing<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart:<s%> for I am <S%H7121>called<s%> by your <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

I <S%H3427>didn't<s%> sit in the <S%H5475>assembly<s%> of those who make <S%H7832>merry,<s%> nor <S%H5937>rejoiced;<s%> I <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H910>alone<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> for you have <S%H4390>filled<s%> me with <S%H2195>indignation.<s%>

Why is my <S%H3511>pain<s%> <S%H5331>perpetual,<s%> and my <S%H4347>wound<s%> <S%H605>incurable,<s%> which <S%H3985>refuses<s%> to be <S%H7495>healed?<s%> Will you indeed be to me as a <S%H391>deceitful<s%> <S%H4325>brook,<s%> as waters that <S%H539>fail?<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> If you <S%H7725>return,<s%> then will I bring you <S%H7725>again,<s%> that you may <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3318>me;<s%> and if you take forth the <S%H3368>precious<s%> from the <S%H2151>vile,<s%> you shall be as my <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> they shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H7725>you,<s%> but you shall not return to them.

I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you to this <S%H5971>people<s%> a <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H2346>wall;<s%> and they shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H3201>you,<s%> but they shall not prevail against <S%H3467>you;<s%> for I am with you to save you and to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H5002>you,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7451>wicked,<s%> and I will <S%H6299>redeem<s%> you out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H6184>terrible.<s%>
